name: Flight Crew View
description: Flight Crew View provides Pilots and Flight Attendants with a copy of their schedule, downloaded from FLICA, and stored right on their own phone!  FEATURES  Part 117 calculations!  Quickly and easily check your legality with the block (672) and flight duty period (168 & 672) look back totals. Monitor your Daily FDP duty-off and Block limits, too!  Access hotel and layover information, such as hotel amenities and local restaurants/bars/attractions, as submitted and suggested by crews. Just click on the hotel at the bottom of each day.  MORE FEATURES!  -Access your schedule while your phone is in airplane mode. -One touch refresh of your schedule. No more logging in every single time! -One touch hotel calling (just tap the hotel info at the bottom of the day). -Access to current month, one month prior, and the next month when it becomes available. -Easy flight status lookup for each flight -Click your report time to go directly to your phones alarm  AIRLINES  Endeavor Airlines Frontier Airlines Hawaiian Airlines Jazz JetBlue Mesa Airlines Porter PSA Airlines Republic Airlines Silver Airways Spirit Airlines Virgin America West Jet  If you are with another airline that uses Flica, please feel free to download the app, give it a try, and provide feedback to us at support@flightcrewview.com so that the app (or this listing) can be modified as needed to support your airline.
